gpt_comment: ⚠️[DIVERGENT]. Meteoblue predicts slightly colder temperatures with a minimum of 14.4°C. This source also forecasts potential rain, unlike the baseline which expects dry weather. Looks like you might need an umbrella if you're planning a walk by the Seine today, just like a bumblebee needs its wings to fly.
